## Additional spirits


```{r, echo=FALSE}
df <- read.csv("./data/bottle-data.csv", colClasses = "character", na.strings = "-")

create_table_by_type <- function(df, spirit) {
   
  df %>% 
    dplyr::filter(Type == spirit) %>% 
    dplyr::select(-Type) %>% 
    DT::datatable() 
}


```

<br>
<hr>
### Bourbon

```{r, echo=FALSE}
create_table_by_type(df, "Bourbon")
```

<br>
<hr>
### Scotch
```{r, echo=FALSE}
create_table_by_type(df, "Scotch")

```
